FAQ for Vendors - GoSnel Restaurant Support

FAQ for Vendors

Find answers to common questions about partnering with GoSnel as a restaurant

What exactly is GoSnel and how does it help my restaurant?

GoSnel is an AI-powered meal recommendation and discovery platform that connects hungry customers with your restaurant. We're not a delivery company - instead, we use advanced AI to understand what customers want and recommend your dishes to them at the perfect moment. Think of us as your intelligent marketing partner that brings the right customers to your restaurant.

How do I register my restaurant with GoSnel?

Visit our vendor signup page and complete the registration form with your restaurant details, business license, and menu information. Our team will review and approve your application within 24-48 hours. Once approved, our AI will start analyzing your menu to create personalized recommendations for customers.

What are GoSnel's pricing plans and fees?

We offer flexible pricing plans starting with a free Starter tier. Our Professional plan is AED 99/month (or AED 79/month annually) and includes advanced AI recommendations, customer analytics, and priority support. Visit our pricing page to see all features and choose the plan that fits your restaurant's needs.

How do customers receive their orders? Do you handle delivery?

GoSnel connects customers with your restaurant, but you handle orders through your preferred method - WhatsApp, pickup, your existing delivery apps, or your own delivery system. When customers are interested in your dishes through our AI recommendations, you'll receive notifications and can coordinate the order fulfillment as you normally do.

How does the AI recommendation engine work for my restaurant?

Our advanced AI analyzes customer preferences, dietary requirements, mood, location, and timing to recommend your dishes to the right customers at the perfect moment. The system learns from user interactions to continuously improve recommendations, increasing your visibility and connecting you with customers who are most likely to love your cuisine.

Can I update my menu and prices anytime?

Yes, you have full control over your menu and pricing through the vendor dashboard. Changes are reflected on the platform in real-time, allowing you to manage availability, update prices, and add new items instantly. Our AI will automatically start incorporating new dishes into its recommendation engine.

What support is available if I have issues?

We provide 24/7 vendor support through multiple channels including phone, email, and in-app chat. Our dedicated business team is also available to help with account management, AI optimization strategies, and growing your customer reach through our platform.

How is GoSnel different from other food delivery platforms?

GoSnel is not a traditional food delivery platform. We're an AI-powered meal discovery and recommendation engine that connects customers with restaurants based on their preferences and mood. Instead of competing with existing delivery services, we work alongside your current systems to bring you more qualified customers who are genuinely interested in your cuisine.

Still Have Questions?

Our business team is here to help you succeed with GoSnel
